meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Scott Ylinen Praggya Rustagi Barretto Greg Seroka Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7061.

td.p: Scott Ylinen, a draftsman and college student from Morgantown, West Virginia
Praggya Rustagi Barretto, a project coordinator from Boston, Massachusetts
Greg Seroka, a chef from Steamboat Springs, Colorado (whose 7-day cash winnings total $180,401)

tr.td: MAY THE 4th BE WITH YOU
INTERNET SHORTHAND
NEWS ANCHORS
THE MIDWEST
I SAY IT'S SPINACH
THE "L" WITH IT
